job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: We are seeking a Data Scientist to join our team to develop an insight driven sensing capability with a focus on revolutionizing decision making As part of this role you will be solving big data problems and developing insights as part of a product team of data scientists business analysts and software engineers The team will rely on your expertise in data science to build this visionary new capability for AmgenbrbrstronguCore Responsibilities For The RolebrustrongulliBuild supervised and unsupervised algorithms to provide meaningful insights across Amgens value chain RampD Commercial OperationsliliWork closely with machine learning engineers to develop production code and deliver endtoend solutionsliliTransform ambiguous business questions into measurable and impactful projectsliliCollaborate crossfunctionally with teams of biologists clinical experts doctors and commercial leadsliliTranslate complex problems and solutions and provide actionable insight to executivesliliServe as technical lead on projects and mentor junior and experienced data scientistsliliHelp further build the team including contributing ideas establishing best practices following trends in industry and academiabrliulstronguBasic QualificationsbrustrongulliAdvanced degree in a quantitative field MS PhD or equivalent experiencelili3 year of industry experience in quantitative analytics and applied data scienceliliStrong proficiency in PythonliliExtensive experience building a variety of machine learning modelsliliExperience writing SQL queries mining large and imbalanced datasets using data visualization toolsliliAbility to translate complex data sets and research into simple business recommendationsliliExcellent communicator able to write and speak about technical concepts to business technical and lay audiencesbrliulstronguPreferred QualificationsbrustrongulliExperience working with healthcare data eg electronic medical records claimsliliExperience with distributed Spark Dask and cloud AWS GCP computingliliExperience with Git or similar version control toolliliExperience building deep learning modelsliliFull stack experience with building and deploying modeling pipelinesbrliulJoin UsbrbrIf youre seeking a career where you can truly make a difference in the lives of others a career where you can work at the absolute forefront of biotechnology with the top minds in the field youll find it at AmgenbrbrAmgen a biotechnology pioneer discovers develops and delivers innovative human therapeutics Our medicines have helped millions of patients in the fight against cancer kidney disease rheumatoid arthritis and other serious illnessesbrbrAs an organization dedicated to improving the quality of life for people around the world Amgen fosters an inclusive environment of diverse ethical committed and highly accomplished people who respect each other but compete intensely to win Together we live the Amgen values as we continue advancing science to serve patientsbrbrAmgen is an Equal Opportunity employer and will consider all qualified applicants for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin protected veteran status or disability status
